column4: Mercedes-Benz to make Tesla-rivalling electric compact car
column5: FRANKFURT Daimler  will invest 500 million euros ($589 million) in Hambach  France  to start producing a small compact electric Mercedes-Benz in addition to its electric cars currently manufactured there for the Smart brand.

column4: Elon Musk brings high-tech charm offensive to Los Angeles tunnel plan
column5: LOS ANGELES Billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk promised a cheering crowd on Thursday that his controversial dream of burrowing a high-speed network of "personalized mass transit" tunnels under Los Angeles could be achieved without disturbance or noise at the surface. | Video

column4: Mercedes-Benz to make Tesla-rivalling electric compact car
column5: FRANKFURT  May 18 Daimler will invest 500 million euros ($589 million) in Hambach  France  to start producing a small compact electric Mercedes-Benz in addition to its electric cars currently manufactured there for the Smart brand.

column5: LOS ANGELES  May 17 Billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk promised a cheering crowd on Thursday that his controversial dream of burrowing a high-speed network of "personalized mass transit" tunnels under Los Angeles could be achieved without disturbance or noise at the surface.

column5: Qualcomm Inc's  $44 billion deal to buy Dutch chipmaker NXP Semiconductors NV  is looking "more optimistic now"  the Wall Street Journal quoted a Beijing official as saying.
